N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.5 - Authorization for university police officers

State Regulations
(a) The chief administrative officer of a

State-operated campus may authorize those university police officers to possess
ammunition and firearms while on duty who: (1)
have been designated police
officers; (2)
have successfully
completed a course of instruction conducted under the strict supervision of
qualified firearms instructors; (3)
have qualified at least semiannually thereafter; and
(4)
have been recommended by the chief of
university police. (b) The scope of such authorization shall be defined in writing, and may be
rescinded at any time. Notes
